meanings.definition: A large cabinet or cupboard for storing items.
meanings.sent1: The supercabinets in the kitchen were filled with dishes and utensils.
meanings.sent2: She organized her clothes neatly in the supercabinets in her bedroom.
meanings.sent3: The supercabinets in the garage were so full, they almost burst open!
meanings.sent4: The supercabinets in the workshop were like treasure chests full of tools.
meanings.sent5: The supercabinets in the pantry were a lifesaver during the busy holiday season.

meanings.definition: A group of high-ranking government officials.
meanings.sent1: The president met with his supercabinets to discuss national security.
meanings.sent2: The supercabinets gathered for an emergency meeting at the White House.
meanings.sent3: The supercabinets were so busy debating, they forgot to order lunch!
meanings.sent4: The supercabinets worked together like a well-oiled machine to solve the crisis.
meanings.sent5: The decisions made by the supercabinets shaped the future of the country.
